unnormalised: Hey, any updates on Hardik Pandya's injury? Heard it was a nasty fall near Marine Drive. Dr. Sharma said recovery might take a while. Hope he's back soon for the IPL! Also, what's the news on Neha's knee? Saw she limped off after that Kabaddi match. Apparently, it's a small tear, needs some rest. That new stadium is almost done, 5000 sq ft of pure sports bliss! Rs. 50 Cr budget, wow! Get well soon, both of you!
normalised: Hey, any updates on Hardik Pandya's injury? Heard it was a nasty fall near Marine Drive. Doctor Sharma said recovery might take a while. Hope he's back soon for the I P L! Also, what's the news on Neha's knee? Saw she limped off after that Kabaddi match. Apparently, it's a small tear, needs some rest. That new stadium is almost done, five thousand square feet of pure sports bliss! Rupee fifty crore budget, wow! Get well soon, both of you!
